mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO licenseDriver (userId,gender,nation,driveCardType,birthday,virginDay,validDay,validYears,frontImgUrl,licenseNumber,remark,createTime,userName) VALUES (#{userId},#{gender},#{nation},#{driveCardType},#{birthday},#{virginDay},#{validDay},#{validYears}, #{key},#{licenseNumber},#{remark},now(),#{userName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE frontImgUrl=#{key},remark=#{remark}, updateTime=now()
mapper.update: update licenseDriver set gender=#{gender},nation=#{nation},driveCardType=#{driveCardType},birthday=#{birthday}, virginDay=#{virginDay}, validDay=#{validDay},validYears=#{validYears},userName=#{userName}, updateTime=now(),isDrivingEdit=#{isDrivingEdit} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO licenseDriver (userId,backImgUrl,createTime) VALUES (#{userId},#{key},now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE backImgUrl=#{key}, updateTime=now()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM licenseDriver order by updateTime desc
